can i suspend x, go to shell and reload: not CTL F7, ALT F7 to get back
you can go to 6 different shells - with Ctl-Alt-F1 through Ctl-Alt-F6
once you've 'escaped' X, all you need is Alt-F1, Alt-F2, etc.

if i delete it, can i add it to a panel again?
sure.  but you should be able to move it.  you don't drag mind you - just right-click, click 'move', then let go of the mouse buttons and move the mouse pointer to the other panel
you can add another one to the other panel before you delete the first one if you want - that way you'll not end up with none of them...
